page.title: 13A DAY IN KATHERINE'S LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7a.m. I have breakfast which consists of bacon, eggs and baked beans. At 8.30 I catch the bus to go to school. From 9.00 to 9.30 we have registration and assembly. When this is over we do Religious Education and Mathematics. Playtime is from 10.30 to 10.50 when I play with my friends. We do some roller-skating in the playground. From 12.50 until noon we do some reading and English exercises. We then have our lunch. We then play outside on our skates until 1.15 p.m. when we go into school and do handwriting and P.E. The afternoon break is from 2.30 to 2.45 p.m. We often listen to a story for the last session of the day. I go home on the school bus. I have my tea and then watch "Scooby-Doo" and "Flintstones" on television. I help Dad suckle the cows and then watch TV. until bedtime.
